entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
